t: Bildad Speaks: Man Cannot Be Righteous
Then*p Bildad the Shuhite answered and said:
“Dominion*pn and fear are with God; he*ld makes peace in his high heaven.
Is*ln there any number to his armies? Upon*ld whom does his light not arise?
How*ln then can man be in the right before God? How*ld can he who is born of woman be pure?
Behold,*ln even the moon is not bright, and*ld the stars are not pure in his eyes;
how*ln much less man, who is a maggot, and*ld the son of man, who is a worm!”
